data.message: HOW CAN I HIDE WHEN IM ON FB??? the moment I log on I start getting inbox messages even when I just wanna stroll my timeline......

replies.message: Ok I haven't quite gotten the hang of it by phone because by computer I set it off long ago and kept it that way lol so go on by computer and bottom right where you can see ppl online there should be a gear looking thingy where it's on for green somewhere near there and hit turn it off for everybody and it'll stay that way until you change it. Which either way you or them can message each other online or not anyway so I see it as pointless because I'd rather not be blown up either. Hope that helped!
